description: This script manages the restart and control of the hostapd service for hotspot functionality, including enabling/disabling interfaces, starting/stopping hostapd, and checking hotspot status based on device configuration.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd process and resets network interfaces for hotspot operation.

methods.name: Hostapd_Restart
methods.description: Kills existing hostapd processes and restarts hostapd service, restoring network interfaces.
